import React from "react"; import Entete from "../../../components/entete/entete"; class Inscription extends React.Component { state = { adresseMail : "", password : "", passwordConfirm : "", biographie : "", photo : "", sexe : null } render(){ return( <>
INSCRIPTION - NOUVEL UTILISATEUR
this.setState({adresseMail:event.target.value})} type="email" className="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" aria-describedby="emailHelp" placeholder="example@mail.com"/> We'll never share your email with anyone else.
this.setState({password:event.target.value})} type="password" className="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="azerTY%1230e"/>
this.setState({passwordConfirm:event.target.value})} type="password" className="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="azerTY%1230e"/>
this.setState({photo:event.target.files[0].name})} className="form-control" type="file" id="formFile"/>
Sexe
) } } export default Inscription
